name: Garchomp
flavorText:
When it folds up its body and
extends its wings, it looks like a
jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

previous.name: Gabite
previous.flavorText:
There is a long-held belief that
medicine made from its scales will
heal even incurable illnesses.

next.name: Munchlax
next.flavorText:
It wolfs down its weight in food
once a day, swallowing food whole
with almost no chewing.

pokemon.name: Gible
pokemon.flavorText:
It nests in small, horizontal holes
in cave walls. It pounces to catch
prey that stray too close.

heal even incurable illnesses.
